title.rendered: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery

content.rendered:
Directed by Rian Johnson

Written by Rian Johnson

Star Daniel Craig(Benoit Blanc). Edward Norton(Miles Bron). Janelle Monáe(Andi Brand). Kathryn Hahn(Claire Debella). Leslie Odom Jr.(Lionel Toussaint). Kate Hudson(Birdie Jay). Dave Bautista(Duke Cody). Jessica Henwick(Peg). Madelyn Cline(Whiskey). Noah Segan(Derol). Jackie Hoffman(Ma). Dallas Roberts(Devon Debella). Ethan Hawke(Efficient Man). Hugh Grant(Phillip). Stephen Sondheim(Stephen Sondheim). Natasha Lyonne(Natasha Lyonne). Kareem Abdul-Jabbar(Kareem Abdul-Jabbar). Serena Williams(Serena Williams). Yo-Yo Ma(Yo-Yo Ma). Joseph Gordon-Levitt(Hourly Dong (voice)). Adele Franck(Claire’s Assistant). Jacek Czajka(Lab Worker). Dan Chariton(Dr. Pierre Bonassus). Eddie Gorodetsky(Dr. Peter Clayton). Coco Shinomiya(Emiko Yamane). Dilcia Barrera(Dr. Dilcia Cabrera). Mark Newman(Dr. Mark Swifton). Adam Davenport(Model). Lauren Ivy(Dancer). Momo Picuric(Vampire in Tuxedo). N.J. Gentry(Nikos). Ali Goksoy(Andino (as Captain Ali Goksoy)). James Payton(Lawyer). T. Florian Karnowski(Judge). Angela Lansbury(Angela Lansbury)

Language English

Producers Ram Bergman. Leopold Hughes. Rian Johnson. Tom Karnowski. Andjelija Vlaisavljevic

Production Lionsgate. T-Street
